snippet: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela experienced complications related to his cancer surgery, but he was showing signs of recovery, an official said.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez is showing signs of recovery after experiencing complications related to his cancer surgery, resulting in bleeding that required corrective measures; doubts remain as to whether Chavez will recover enough to return to office.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez of Venezuela experienced complications related to his cancer surgery, but he was showing signs of recovery, an official said.

headline.seo: Chávez Faces Complications From Cancer Surgery
